successes.title: Carry Less, Adventure More: Survival Belt
successes.description: Creating a belt that can handle the worst you can throw at it and look good doing it.

Pledges.description:
TIME CAPSULE
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
"To be remembered, is to not be forgotten." You become an honorary member of the SlideBelts Survival Team! You will receive project updates, and your name will be front and center on our Wall of Fame on SlideBelts.com

7 YEAR FAMINE (base buckle)
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
This is our Base Buckle early bird offer - a gift for those who prepare during the times of plenty.  
Congrats! You beat the rush! We'll ship you the Base Buckle --- identical to the survivor buckle, but without the fire starter. For your support, you get a standard, no-frills, durable survival buckle, plus rugged strap in the color of your choice - custom fit up to 50" waist. While this base buckle has no fire starter, or GPS, it still opens bottles, looks fantastic, withstands most hostile scenarios, and includes our unique strap built to last.

MARTIAL LAW
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
We'll ship you the Base Buckle --- identical to the survivor buckle, but without the fire starter. For your support, you get a standard, no-frills, durable survival buckle, plus rugged strap in the color of your choice - custom fit up to 50" waist. While this base buckle has no fire starter, or GPS, it still opens bottles, looks fantastic, withstands most hostile scenarios, and includes our unique strap built to last.

7 YEAR FAMINE (survivor buckle)
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
This is our early bird offer - a gift for those who prepare during the times of plenty.  
Congrats! You beat the rush! We'll ship you "THE SURVIVOR" buckle, plus rugged strap in the color of your choice - custom fit up to 50" waist.

Upgradable to "THE HUNTER" or "THE EXPLORER" buckles when they are unlocked. Each buckle is unlocked when the corresponding stretch goal is reached. When that happens, a new reward will be added that is identical to this reward, except the buckle included will be "THE HUNTER" or "THE EXPLORER". This will allow you the choice to upgrade to that newly unlocked buckle - and pledge the difference - or just keep the current reward, and stick with "THE SURVIVOR" buckle.

Even the most basic of survival scenarios still needs the best tool. We'll ship you "THE SURVIVOR" buckle, plus rugged strap in the color of your choice - custom fit up to 50" waist.

Upgradable to "THE HUNTER" or "THE EXPLORER" buckles when they are unlocked. Each buckle is unlocked when the corresponding stretch goal is reached. When that happens, a new reward will be added that is identical to this reward, except the buckle included will be "THE HUNTER" or "THE EXPLORER". This will allow you the choice to upgrade to that newly unlocked buckle - and pledge the difference - or just keep the current reward, and stick with "THE SURVIVOR" buckle.

For the early bird backers, we'll ship you "THE HUNTER" buckle, plus rugged strap in the color of your choice - custom fit up to 50" waist.

SHIPWRECKED (Hunter Buckle)
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾

SOLAR STORM
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
This is our limited edition ammo boxed set, for those who appreciate a good storm, or a downed power grid. Thanks for your support! You get "THE SURVIVOR" buckle and your choice of two rugged straps of your color choice, custom up to 50", all shipped in the limited edition "AMMO BOX" packaging. You also got a "Carry Less, Adventure More" t-shirt.

Upgradable to "THE HUNTER" or "THE EXPLORER" buckles when they are unlocked. Each buckle is unlocked when the corresponding stretch goal is reached. When that happens, a new reward will be added that is identical to this reward, except the buckle included will be "THE HUNTER" or "THE EXPLORER". This will allow you the choice to upgrade to that newly unlocked buckle - and pledge the difference - or just keep the current reward, and stick with "THE SURVIVOR" buckle.

NUCLEAR WINTER
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Surviving isn't enough - survive with a style uniquely your own. This is our CUSTOMIZED buckle reward option. Engrave it, make it yours. We wanted to give you the opportunity to do just that. Be one of the first to receive "THE SURVIVOR" buckle with a custom engraving of your choice, including two 50" rugged straps, with the limited edition "AMMO BOX" packaging. You also get a limited edition "Carry Less, Adventure More" t-shirt.

Upgradable to "THE HUNTER" or "THE EXPLORER" buckles when they are unlocked. Each buckle is unlocked when the corresponding stretch goal is reached. When that happens, a new reward will be added that is identical to this reward, except the buckle included will be "THE HUNTER" or "THE EXPLORER". This will allow you the choice to upgrade to that newly unlocked buckle - and pledge the difference - or just keep the current reward, and stick with "THE SURVIVOR" buckle.

Be one of the first to receive "THE HUNTER" buckle with a custom engraving of your choice, including two 50" rugged straps, with the limited edition "AMMO BOX" packaging. You also get a limited edition "Carry Less, Adventure More" t-shirt.

ZOMBIE INVASION
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Plan for the worst, prepare for the unknown. Why have just a regular sized strap, when you can have a 20 ft., 2000 lb. tensile strength tie-down! This reward gets you "THE SURVIVOR" buckle, with a 50" strap of your choice, the limited edition "AMMO BOX" packaging, and an interchangeable 20 ft. rugged tie-down strap. You also get a limited edition "Carry Less, Adventure More" t-shirt, and the coveted camouflage SlideBelt hat.
